channel.title: Best Server You Will EVER Join!
channel.description:
[b]IP: gigglej.zapto.org[/b] - [u]If you﻿ join please say Timbit brought you[/u]
[u]I joined this server about a week ago and just had to share it with you. The owner gives out tons of ranks to people and are really easy to get Most come with creative mode![/u]
The server has -Factions -Friendly Staff -Ranks -Creative﻿ World -Friendly Members -PvP and much more... Why not﻿ join?﻿
